title: About page: restrict black text styling to What Sets Me Apart InfoCards

requirements.summary: Scope black text styling so only the InfoCards in the About page “What Sets Me Apart” section render black title/description text while all other About text retains existing colors.
acceptanceCriteria: On /about, the InfoCards in the "What Sets Me Apart" grid display black text for the title and description.
On /about, the biography/body text remains unchanged (continues to follow the existing About biography styling).
On /about, headings such as "About Me", "What Sets Me Apart", and "Core Values" remain unchanged (no forced black text).
No other pages/routes have their text colors changed as a side-effect of this update.

file_operations.description: Add a dedicated wrapper class around the “What Sets Me Apart” section (or the highlights grid) so InfoCard-specific black text overrides can be precisely scoped to that section only.

Update the existing About page light card text override to: (1) scope it under the new “What Sets Me Apart” wrapper, and (2) force true black for the InfoCard title/description elements only (no changes to headings/biography styles; no global changes outside /about).
